name: GREED (itch)
description:
At this Ludum Dare I created to the theme 'Running out of Power' a Metroidvania/Jump & Run
survival lifesteal game?  I don't know  how can I better describe my game genre.

The gameplay is  simple.

 Your life is equal to your attack damage and jumping exhaust you.

Kill enemys to get health and for more attack damage.

Controlls:

Keyboard:

WASD - move

Space - jump

Enter - attack

Xbox Controller:

Joystick - move

A - jump

X - attack

Have fun. :)
